body: After that they moved to the countryside. An old man came to say hi, and the father introduced her as his wife. But then the old man became suspicious and asked why did she call him "dad", and isn't she's too young to be his wife. Kiyoko answered that it's because he is soon going to be a dad, as she touches her belly implying she's pregnant. The end.

I used MTL so take this with a grain of salt.

Plot summary: The girl's name is Kiyoko, and the man is her father. Her mom died a long time ago, and at some point her dad started to touch her body. In the past she was too young to understand the meaning of his acts, but now she knows. Her dad, despite being a lolicon who lays hands on his own daughter, is actually a very caring father, and Kiyoko is okay with being molested every night. Actually, she's the one who wanted more so her dad had to rush to a convenience store and buy some condoms. 

And then, they had sex. When they're done, Kiyoko asked her dad how old is he (46), as she's worrying he might be too old by the time she's an adult. She told him to "take responsibility", and the dad said it's obviously so since he is her father after all, but that's clearly not what she meant.
I do not understand the words, but I can feel the love through their actions

How do I best support the creator? Where is his website/patreon ect?

I love his work but I cant find anywhere I can buy his stuff in EU.
Looks great but yeah translation will be great
@epstein8 what happens when my parents are already dead? does the curse end with me?

If you are reading this comment your parents will die within 5 years. To undo this curse you need to copy this and paste it on 5 other manga. Sorry y'all i got cursed too, you can't understimate random people curse
